ping.title: 🏓 Pong! 🏓
ping.isDev: This is a development version of ActivityRank.

rank.noEntries: No entries found for this page.

bonus.notInServer: This user is not in the server.
bonus.cannotAddXP: You cannot add bonus XP to bots.
bonus.massXP: This server already has a mass role operation running.
bonus.successfully: Successfully gave {{changeAmount}} bonus XP to {{affected}} member(s) with role {{role}}

channel.deprecated:
## No-Command Channels are __deprecated__.

Manage Application Command permissions in **Server Settings > Integrations > ActivityRank** instead!

*You can still **disable** No-Command channels.*'
channel.noCommandDesription:
If this is enabled, commands will not work in this channel.
> **Note:** It is recommended to use the Discord native system in **Server Settings -> Integrations -> ActivityRank** instead
channel.commandOnlyDescription:
If this is enabled, this will be the **only channel commands will work in**, unless you have the **Manage Server** permission.
> **Note:** It is recommended to use the Discord native system in **Server Settings -> Integrations -> ActivityRank** instead.
channel.joinChannelDescription: If this is enabled, server join messages will be sent to this channel.
channel.levelupChannelDescription: If this is enabled, levelup messages will be sent to this channel.
channel.conflict:
You have specified both a channel and an ID, but they do not match.
Did you mean: /config-channel channel:{{value}}
channel.notSpecified: You need to specify either a channel or a channel's ID!
channel.missingPerms: You need the permission to manage the server in order to use this command.
channel.noXPenabled: If this is enabled, no xp will be given in this channel.

member.notifyDMDescription: If this is enabled, the bot will send you a DM when you level up.
member.reactVoteDescription: If this is enabled, reacting with the server's voteEmote, {{value}}, will give an upvote to the member that sent the message.

messages.missingPerms: You need the permission to manage the server in order to use this command.
messages.joinMessageDescription: The message to send when a member joins the server
messages.levelupMessageDescription: The message to send when a member gains a level
messages.assignMessageDescription: The message to send when a member gains a role, unless overridden
messages.deassignMessageDescription: The message to send when a member loses a role, unless overridden
messages.askClear: Which message do you want to clear?

role.missingPerms: You need the permission to manage the server in order to use this command.
role.everyone: You cannot make @everyone a level role.
role.manageRoles: Please ensure the bot has the permission to manage roles.
role.error1:
Using an assignLevel higher than or equal to a deassignLevel will not work: the role gets removed as soon as it gets added!
Did you mean: **assign-level:{{deassignLevel}} deassign-level:{{assignLevel}}**?
role.missingOption: You must specify at least one option for this command to do anything!
role.maxRoles: There is a maximum of 3 roles that can be assigned or deassigned from each level. Please remove some first.
role.noXPDescription: If this is enabled, no xp will be given to members that have this role.
role.assignMessageDescription: This is the message sent when this role is given to a member. Defaults to the global assignMessage.
role.deassignMessageDescription: This is the message sent when this role is removed from a member. Defaults to the global deassignMessage.
role.toClear: Which message do you want to clear?'
role.assignToSend: The message to send upon assignment
role.deassignToSend: The message to send upon deassignment

upvote.notOnServer: This member is not on this server.
